definition: surname Wei/ancient Chinese state near present day Chongqing/Taiwan pr. [Wei2]

sentences.english: Objective To explore the clinical application of keyhole craniotomy microsurgery in neurosurgery.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討鎖孔入路顯微手術在神經外科的應用。
這也就是稱爲場至發射顯微鏡的技術。

sentences.english: Nature composes some of her loveliest poems for the microscope and telescope.
sentences.chinese: 自然爲顯微鏡和望遠鏡創作了一些她最優美的詩。

sentences.english: STM is a low coast A. S. K. SAW transmitter module.
sentences.chinese: 掃描隧道顯微鏡是一種低海岸調幅聲發射模塊。

sentences.english: Morphology of HSV-1 was identified by inverted microscope.
sentences.chinese: 利用倒置顯微鏡對病毒感染進行形態學鑑定。

sentences.english: Seen under a microscope , a fresh snowflake has a delicate six-pointed shape.
sentences.chinese: 在顯微鏡下觀察，剛飄下的雪花呈精巧的六角形。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the microsurgical technique in managing medial sphenoid ridge meningioma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內側型蝶骨嵴腦膜瘤顯微手術技巧。

sentences.english: Through microscopic observations researchers identified up to 61 morphospecies.
sentences.chinese: 研究者通過顯微鏡的觀察鑑定了總共61個變種。

sentences.english: Microscopical analysis is one of the most versatile techniques in the hands of trained operators.
sentences.chinese: 顯微分析是有訓練的手工操作方面最普通的技術之一。

sentences.english: First, learn how to focus the microscope.
sentences.chinese: 首先，學習顯微鏡如何調焦。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical characteristic and microsurgical treatment of intracranial aneurysms.
sentences.chinese: 目的探索顱內動脈瘤的臨牀特徵及顯微外科治療。

sentences.english: It is beautifully illustrated with color illustrations, photographs, and scanning electron micrographs.
sentences.chinese: 它被用顏色插圖，照片和掃描電子顯微照片說明得好。

sentences.english: The outburst of emulsions was observed by photics microscope.
sentences.chinese: 乳劑的破裂是用光學顯微鏡下觀察。

sentences.english: In itsearly years, it manufactured microscopes almost exclusively.
sentences.chinese: 早年這裏差不多隻生產顯微鏡。

sentences.english: The anatomic characteristics of the anterior communicating arterial fenestration were observed under the operating microscope.
sentences.chinese: 在手術顯微鏡下，觀察前交通動脈成窗的解剖學特徵。

sentences.english: In this system, the image of the holes on the spinneret were zoomed in and stored for post-processing.
sentences.chinese: 該系統通過顯微鏡對噴絲孔進行放大成像並採集保存。

definition: forged book/book of dubious authenticity/misattributed book/Apocrypha
to have a fluent command of (idiom)
my limited view (lit. view through a thin tube)/my limited understanding/my opinion (humble)
see 拔苗助長|拔苗助长[ba2 miao2 zhu4 zhang3]
to turn peril into safety (idiom); to avert a danger (esp. political or medical)
Liuying township in Tainan county 台南縣|台南县[Tai2 nan2 xian4], Taiwan
to form a picture/to develop a photo/to visualize
to be in overall charge/to oversee
important matter that must be kept secret (idiom); don't breathe a word of it to anyone!
to interpret (a visual document, a medical exam, an historical event etc)/to analyze data (from a chip, a black box etc)

pinyin: li4 shi3 wei2 wu4 zhu3 yi4
